page.shortlink: api client api a5 panellayout expandflow method

argument.name: expandAll
argument.description: Whether or not to expand all panels, or just to expand to the next collapsed panel (if A5.PanelLayout.collapseFlow was called multiple times).

argument.name: animation
argument.description: Whether or not to animate the panel layout transition.

page.description: Activate a child panel of the layout.
